lead_paragraph: Home energy reports will be sent to about 270,000 customers in New York, with recommendations on how to lower their bills.

headline.print_headline: Con Ed Seeks to Advise Clients on Saving Energy
headline.main: Con Edison Aims to Revamp Customer Service, Saving Energy Too

snippet: Home energy reports will be sent to about 270,000 customers in New York, with recommendations on how to lower their bills.
abstract: Con Edison will send 270,000 residential customers in Brooklyn and Westchester County personalized reports on their energy use and suggestions for products to help them cut energy costs.
